meanings.definition: Resembling or related to the hyrax.
meanings.sent1: The hyracoid creature had similar features to the hyrax.
meanings.sent2: The hyracoid markings on the animal made it blend in with its surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The hyracoid design on the t-shirt was quite fashionable.
meanings.sent4: Her room was decorated in a hyracoid style, with earthy tones and nature-inspired patterns.
meanings.sent5: The artist captured the essence of the hyracoid landscape in his painting.

meanings.definition: A small, herbivorous mammal resembling a rabbit.
meanings.sent1: The hyracoid nibbled on the grass peacefully.
meanings.sent2: In the zoo, visitors marveled at the cute hyracoid hopping around.
meanings.sent3: The hyracoid's ears twitched as it listened to the birds chirping nearby.
meanings.sent4: The children giggled as they watched the hyracoid playfully chase its tail.
meanings.sent5: The researcher carefully observed the behavior of the hyracoid in its natural habitat.
